node.title: Let's get in touch
node.subtitle: Benoit Maigret | Freelance Front-End Developer

content.content: You'd like to contact me, talk about your project? Send me an email to *hello\[at\]benoitmaigret.com* or you can find me on [Github](https://github.com/BenMt "Github"), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/benoitmaigret "Twitter") or [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/benoitmaigret/ "LinkedIn")
